content: In the Carteret Islands, near Papua New Guinea, some people have already had to leave their homes because the seawater is washing around their houses.
translations: ita:Nelle Isole Carteret, vicino alla Papua Nuova Guinea, alcune persone hanno già dovuto lasciare le loro case perché l'acq
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
